bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with gui mei 鬼魅② , demonic seduction-specters. Shi zhai bai yi xuan Recipe book. Southern Song era, 1196. fang 是齋百一選方 17 Recipe Entry shen xian jie du wan bing wan 神仙解毒萬病丸 , pills of the immortals that dissolve poison [and cure] a myriad of of diseases: 驚死，鬼迷，未隔宿者，並 冷水磨灌下 , “[For patients] with [an appearance of] death because they were frightened and have succumbed to deception by a demon , if this has not continued over night yet, grind [these pills] with cold water and force [the patient] to drink this”.
